name: Tanner

name: Quarry
ability: You may develop once per turn as a free action.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science they provide.

name: Armory
ability: Your draw limit is increased by 1.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science they provide.

name: Bank
ability: When opening a business, pay 1 less gold.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Lodge
ability: When you start a business, you may open it immediately, discard Lodge, and return its contract card to the demand.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Mercenary
ability: When “Barbarians” events resolve, add 1 to their number and gain 2g from their spoils.
effect: If there is food in the demand pile, -1 population.

name: Laboratory
ability: If you draw a card with science demand, reveal it to gain 4g.
effect: If there is food in the demand pile, -1 population.

name: Spear Maker
ability: When opened, you may put the bottom card from the demand pile as a contract on any business.
effect: Each player discards 1 business and returns its contract card to the demand pile.

name: Temple
ability: After you play an event, you may draw a card and discard.
effect: Players gain 1g per hide they provide.

name: Tower
ability: Whenever you play an event, gain 1g.
effect: Players gain +2g per stone they provide.

name: Hay Maker
ability: You may play one event per turn as a free action.
effect: Players gain +2g per stone they provide.

name: Spearman
ability: EOTA (end of the age): you may play one more action.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Fruit Stand
ability: EOTA (end of the age): If you provide more food than anyone, gain 3g.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Trade Post
ability: For each business you have when this is opened (including this), gain 1g.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Bronze Mine
ability: When opened, place 7g here.  Gain 1 of these on each turn.  When contracted, remove remaining gold.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Market
ability: You may treat one food provision as any resource for contracting purposes.
effect: If there is food in the demand pile, -1 population.

name: Knight
ability: When you play an event, you may place it at the bottom of the current events instead.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Bookstore
ability: You may return one contract to the demand pile on your turn.
effect: Draw a card and add it to the demand pile.

name: Bladesmith
ability: You gain gold stolen by “Barbarians” events (after Mercenary).
effect: If total weapons provided exceeds demand card count by at least 3, +1 population and treasury +10g.

name: Workshop
ability: After starting a business, you may draw a card, then discard.
effect: Treasury +5g

name: Dairy Farm
ability: You may start one business per turn as a free action.
effect: Discard the oldest happiness demanded

name: Warehouse
ability: Your draw limit is increased by 2.
effect: Players gain +3g per bronze they provide.

name: Hospital
ability: When taking a contract, you may treat one happiness demand as any resource.
effect: Players gain +3g per bronze they provide.

name: Castle
ability: To open, you must first discard a weapon business and its contract.  When opened, gain an extra action this turn.
effect: Treasury -2g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Butcher
ability: When opened, you may add a card from your hand to the demand pile.
effect: Players providing cloth may sell a business and draw a card.

name: Accountant
ability: Your contract payouts are increased by 1.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): you may contract any business using the top card of the discard pile.

name: Grocer
ability: To open, you must also discard a food business and return its contract card to the demand pile.
effect: Each player gains 2g per science they provide.

name: Pawn Shop
ability: When a hide, stone, or bronze is placed in the demand pile, gain 2g.
effect: Treasury -3g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Gravedigger
ability: When opened, add two cards of your choice from the discard pile to the demand pile.
effect: Treasury -3g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.

name: Monastery
ability: When drawing, you may draw the revealed event or the bottom card of the demand pile.
effect: Players gain 3g per food they provide.

name: Cotton Mill
ability: On your turn, add any number of cards to the demand pile from your hand.
effect: If total weapons provided exceeds demand card count by at least 3, +1 population and treasury +10g.

name: Cafe
ability: When opened, play one free action for every two food provided.
effect: Treasury +8g

name: Gunsmith
ability: Your contracts are paid for from the supply if the treasury is exhausted.
effect: Players providing cloth: +5g

name: Security
ability: EOTA (end of the age): earn 2g from a player with fewer weapons.
effect: Treasury +8g

name: Clothier
ability: When opened, gain 1g for each type of resource you provide.
effect: Treasury loses 20g, reduced 5-3-2g per happiness provided by players (2p-3p-4p).

name: Museum
ability: When opened, draw the top two cards from the discard pile.
effect: Open, uncontracted businesses earn 3g each.

name: University
ability: When opened, return the development cards to your hand.
effect: Treasury -3g for each demand card in excess of total weapons provided.
